name: Unicorn Kid
description: '''Oliver Sabin''' (born 5 November 1991), formerly known as '''Unicorn Kid''', is a Scottish [[electronic music]]/[[chip music]] composer and musician from [[Edinburgh]], educated at [[Leith Academy]]. When asked about the name of the act, Sabin stated, "There's no real story behind the name, it just kind of came about and fitted in with the fun, magical nature of the music." Sabin has had a number of [[BBC Radio 1]] appearances including an early live session on the [[Vic Galloway]] BBC Radio 1 show and a [[Maida Vale Studios|BBC Maida Vale Studios]] session for [[Rob da Bank]]. In September 2014, he announced the end of Unicorn Kid to pursue a different alias. In 2017, Sabin released a DJ set on SoundCloud under the alias '''Plush'''.
